thread.title: UK Men’s Basketball Practice to be Televised by ESPNU on Sunday
thread.title_full: UK Men’s Basketball Practice to be Televised by ESPNU on Sunday

title: UK Men’s Basketball Practice to be Televised by ESPNU on Sunday
text:
UK Men’s Basketball Practice to be Televised by ESPNU on Sunday Posted: Mon 11:49 AM, Oct 05, 2015 / Headlines List / Article 
LEXINGTON, Ky. (UK Athletics) – Kentucky fans will have an opportunity to get another early look at this year’s men’s basketball team in action as UK’s practice on Sunday will be televised live on ESPNU from 7-9 p.m. 
The Wildcats will go through various agility and shooting drills in addition to 3-on-3 and 5-on-5 scrimmaging. 
Doris Burke, Jay Williams and Seth Greenberg will be on hand to call the action for ESPNU, along with Andy Katz, who will handle sideline reports. 
It’s the second season in a row UK has had a practice televised live. 
For the latest on the Kentucky men's basketball team, follow @KentuckyMBB on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram, and on the web at UKathletics.com.
